name: Service Gateway Helperscripts
title: Service Gateway Helperscripts
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TS/pages/1052476586 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Using the helpers scripts

To be able to use the helpers scripts, you have to do the following initially:

  • Login to a Service Gateway

  • Navigate to your home folder (cd ~) and edit .bashrc: vi .bashrc

  • Add the following line:

    • Frankfurt (no longer in use - kept for documentation purposes)

      . $HOME"/bashHelpersEFS_TS/EFS_TS_bashhelpers.sh"

    • AWS:

      source /nfs/techsupport/bashhelperstsforaws/EFS_TS_bashhelpers.sh

Overview of the Helpers

Get an overview of the Helpers

=====================================================================
Needed files : getHelpers.sh
Aliases : helpers
Usage : helpers
Parameters : No
Known Change Request:

Get information about an installation (i-script)

=====================================================================
Needed files : inst.sh / init.php / iskript.php / getConfigVars.php / infos_ueber_installation.sh
Aliases : i
Usage : i [URL or installation name]
Example : i http://mingle.respondi.com or i mingle
Known Change Request:

Add an update entry to the installation in Globis

=====================================================================
Needed files : globis_sync.sh / update_globis.php
Aliases : helpersEfsUpdateEntryInGlobis, helpersDVUpdateEntryInGlobis oder u
Parameters : text
Usage : helpersUpdateEintragInGlobis [reason why the installation was updated/upgraded]
Example : helpersUpdateEintragInGlobis Update concerning critical bug
Known Change Request:

Get the short version history of an EFS version

=====================================================================
Needed files : getROMHistory.sh
Aliases : helpersGetEfsVersion,helpersEfsGetVersion
Parameters : Version without EFS_ z.B. 10.8
Usage : helpersGetEfsVersion 10.0
Known Change Request:

Needed files : getBuilds.sh
Aliases : helpersGetEFSBuild, helpersEfsGetBuild
Export : No
Parameters : 1
Usage : helpersGetEFSBuild EFS_10.8 #Get EFS 10.8 Build
Usage : helpersGetEFSBuild EFS_DV-2.5-0087 #Get DV 2.5 Build

application_env set for programmings developed by Boris

Usage : [always available]
Aliases : NONE
export : Yes
Parameters : No
Example : none
Known Change Request:

Remove installation from ROM

=====================================================================
Needed files : removeFromROM.sh
Usage : helpersRemoveInstallationFromROM [installation path]
Aliases : helpersRemoveInstallationFromROM, helpersEfsRemoveInstallationFromROM
Parameters : installation path
Example : helpersRemoveInstallationFromROM /nfs/opst4/mingle.respondi.com/htdocs
Known Change Request:

If you have removed an installation from ROM, please leave an update for the installation in Globis.

Get config from database

=====================================================================
Needed files : readConfigValues.php readConfigValues.sh
Usage : helpersGetEfsConfiguration [search parameter]
Aliases : helpersGetEfsConfiguration,helpersEfsGetConfiguration OR config
Parameters : individually
Example : helpersGetEfsConfiguration nein #will show all modified config variables
helpersGetEfsConfiguration path #Get all config variables that contain path"
helpersGetEfsConfiguration # without parameter, all variables will be shown
Known Change Request:

Add user to several EFS installations

=====================================================================
Needed files : add_account.php
Aliases : helpersEfsAddQuestbackUserToSeveralInstallations
Parameters : will be asked for
Usage : helpersEfsAddQuestbackUserToSeveralInstallations

Search and get Rabbit MQ-Hash

=====================================================================
Needed files : getRabbitMq.sh and getRabbitMqHash.php
Aliases : helpersGetRabbitMq, helpersEfsGetRabbitMq
Usage : helpersGetRabbitMq --hash [hash value]
helpersGetRabbitMq -h
helpersGetRabbitMq
Parameters : -h for help
-hash to get the installation linked to that hash
-i Hashtag to get the installation linked to that hash

Get all queries for a specified query Id - obsolete

=====================================================================
Needed files : efsgrep.sh
Aliases : helpersGetQueryIdFromLiveLog,helpersLogGetQueryIdFromLiveLog or just q
Usage : helpersGetQueryIdFromLiveLog [QUERY-ID] or q [QUERY-ID]
Example : helpersGetQueryIdFromLiveLog 123456 or q 123456
Known Change Request:

Search PHP error logs for PHP errors - obsolete

=====================================================================
Needed files : grepPhpErrorlog.sh
Aliases : helpersSearchPhpErrors,helpersLogSearchPhpErrors,helpersPhpSearchErrors,phperrors
Usage : helpersSearchPhpErrors
Example : helpersSearchPhpErrors # without Parameters the Usage is shown
helpersSearchPhpErrors fatal # searches for fatal errors (only for today's date)
helpersSearchPhpErrors [searchterm]-all # searches for searchterm in all php error logs for the whole month
helpersSearchPhpErrors ".*" -all # searches for all errors in all php error logs for the whole month
helpersSearchPhpErrors parse -all # searches for parse errors n all php error logs for the whole month
Known Change Request:

Usage : helpersGetDataVoyagerLatestEINS_EINS
Example : helpersGetDataVoyagerLatestEINS_EINS
Known Change Request:

Aliases : helpersChangeEFSConfig,helpersEfsChangeConfig

Needed files : Framework by Freddy, we just call the file cli

Navigate to installation without database connection

=====================================================================
Needed files : inst_quick.sh
Aliases : i2
Usage : i2 [search parameter]
Example : i2 www.unipark.de
Known Change Request:

 

Non-”Helperscripts”

Healself

=====================================================================
Needed files : www/healself.php
Aliases :
Usage :
Example: Execute healself on installation

cd ../www

php support/healself.php

Known Change Request: N/A

If a healself task fails, here is how to check what the reason was and how to solve the issue:

  • healself_task_log (this is where failed Healself Tasks are recorded) - Healself Tasks

Example error message:

The following tasks failed with errors:
- panel_healself_jobs_1007::createElasticsearchIndexOnNewInstallation [Create an elasticsearch index on a new panel installation]:
  - Task reported it failed on line 725 in class panel_healself_jobs_1007

Solution:

  • This is a panel healself task so navigate to the healself folder in the panel module:

  • cd modules/panel/components/healself/jobs/

  • Open the healself file of the corresponding EFS version and directly jump to the problematic line (in this case it is line 725 as said in the error message above):

  • vi 1007.inc.php +725

  • Check the code in that line

    • If a database query is executed, execute the query manually on the database to see the exact error message.

    • In this case connection to the Elastic Search service was not possible because the host "elasticsearch" could not be found. The host was changed in the config accordingly:

      • Bremen: elasticsearch.bre.globalpark.com

      • Procus3 elasticsearch.bre.globalpark.com (points to the IP of the Elastic Search service on the Testkanal)

      • Testkanal: tka055

  • Execute healself again to see whether the problem is fixed

    • If the problem still exists or other error message are shown, repeat the steps above

    • If the problem is fixed and no other messages are shown, check whether the installation was set to BROKEN=1:

      • in htdocs/conf open file "VERSION" and set BROKEN=0 if needed

Adding new helperscripts

  1. Create new helpers script

  2. Adjust README.txt and add new helpers

  3. Set alias in EFS_TS_bashhelpers.sh
